dialogue: Dilbert is always interrupting me because I'm a woman.
How do you deal with it when he interrupts you?
That makes no sense. He interrupts me because I'm a woman, and you're a woman... so...
Maybe he doesn't interrupt me because I make sense when I talk.
Whereas you're more of a babbling nincompoop and a notorious ruiner of meetings.
Well, I certainly don't know where you...
